Text:
thanks for the anime-serie,this is a very good story
i had it from subfan acx,if basilisk is a style that you like i would also recommend shigurui and serei no moribito (guardian sacred spirit)
The subs are not sync in many episodes, very frustrating.

If you use vlc you have an option to choose +/- delay on subtitles by pressing the G and H keys. 
Fixed the delay problem for me
